title: Complete Web Development Bootcamp
description: A comprehensive learning path to master modern web development from fundamentals to advanced techniques, covering frontend, backend, and full-stack development.
author: Content Team

modules.title: Web Development Fundamentals
modules.description: Master HTML, CSS, and JavaScript basics

modules.title: Responsive Web Design
modules.description: Create designs that work on all devices

modules.title: JavaScript Advanced Concepts
modules.description: Master closures, async programming, and modern ES6+

outcomes: Master HTML, CSS, and JavaScript fundamentals
Create responsive and accessible web pages
Understand and apply modern web development practices
Deploy and maintain production web applications

capstone.title: Full-Stack Web Application Project
capstone.description: Design and build a complete web application from frontend UI to backend API, demonstrating mastery of all concepts learned throughout the bootcamp
requirements: Frontend: Responsive, interactive UI using modern techniques
Backend: RESTful API with proper authentication
Database: Persistent data storage and retrieval
Deployment: Live application accessible via URL
Testing: Basic unit and integration tests
